prompt:
Best time to book LGA→SJO within next 60 days.
Include: fare ranges (USD), typical booking window (days before departure),
peak/holiday effects, basic bag policy differences, and 1–2 concrete examples.
Return STRICT JSON: {
  "origin": string, "destination": string, "window_days": number,
  "best_window_days": [min,max], "fare_low_usd": number, "fare_high_usd": number,
  "notes": string
}

message.content:
{
  "origin": "LGA",
  "destination": "SJO",
  "window_days": 30,
  "best_window_days": [21, 45],
  "fare_low_usd": 250,
  "fare_high_usd": 600,
  "notes": "Booking 3-6 weeks in advance typically yields the best fares. Expect higher prices during peak holiday seasons (e.g., Christmas, New Year). Basic economy fares often include one personal item but charge for carry-on and checked bags. For example, a fare of $300 can be found if booked 30 days in advance, while last-minute fares may exceed $500."
}
